name: Deep Insights
description: A powerful javascript library to generate statistical dashboards and autostyling for your maps

name: d3.cartodb
description: Carto's vector rendering library, using D3 to paint data visualisations with svg, no webgl needed!

name: Marginotes
description: Marginotes takes your jQuery selection and adds notes to the margin with the text provided in HTML attributes

name: Termimap
description: Termimap is a terminal-based maps viewer with its own GeoJSON renderer

name: Torque.js
description: Torque is Carto's rendering engine for animated maps

name: Help me I'm lost
description: Help Me I'm Lost (HIL) is a sort of map server that generates super-barebones png tiles so that I can work offline with basemaps.

name: Torque Heatmaps
description: My first project in Carto was adding a heatmap renderer to the Torque.js project

name: Pelias
description: During the summer of 2014 I spent some months contributing to the result relevance of Mapzen's open source geosearch engine

name: Mapbox Android SDK
description: Mapbox hired me in 2013 to build the foundations of their Mobile SDK for Android and introduce the Mapbox platform to the Android community

name: The building is...
description: One of my first projects as a developer was going onsite to La Gaie Lyrique in Paris and for two weeks make a building sentient, using Processing and Arduino

name: Forgotten Routes
description: The main outcome of my final degree project was a map that linked all the abandoned railways in Britain

name: The Twisted London Underground Map
description: A topological, but not geographical, representation of the London Underground. It kinda looks like spaghetti.
